title: Confusing error when trying to run build.cmd without VS installed
body:

### Issue Description
<!--
* Please include a clear and concise description of the problem.

The error when attempting to run build.cmd from a freshly-downloaded and extracted zip of msbuild is confusing.

### Expected Behavior
<!--
* The expected output or behavior.
-->
Tell me to download VS.

### Actual Behavior
<!--

`Exception calling "Start" with "0" argument(s): "The system cannot find the file specified"`
